name: ux
description: Semantic CSS component library compiled with Tailwind v4. Dual output: semantic classes + Tailwind utilities. Zero dependencies for consumers.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run build:semantic && npm run build:tw && npm run build:full
scripts.build:semantic: npx @tailwindcss/cli -i src/css/ux.css -o dist/ux.css && npx lightningcss --minify dist/ux.css -o dist/ux.min.css
scripts.build:tw: npx @tailwindcss/cli -i src/css/tw.css -o dist/tw.css && npx lightningcss --minify dist/tw.css -o dist/tw.min.css
scripts.build:full: cat dist/ux.css dist/tw.css > dist/ux-full.css && npx lightningcss --minify dist/ux-full.css -o dist/ux-full.min.css

author: ERPlora
